title: Career
description: My professional journey spans AI/ML research, education, and industry leadership roles.

items.title: Head of Engineering
items.description: Leading engineering teams and implementing real-time video analysis technologies.
responsibilities: Leading and tracking progress across multiple teams, including backend, frontend, mobile, UX/UI, DevOps, and machine learning
Collaborating with ML team to design and implement core machine learning technologies for real-time video analysis
Overseeing technical architecture and ensuring alignment with business objectives
Managing project timelines and resource allocation across engineering departments

items.title: Head of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
items.description: Led ML team and developed architecture for computer vision applications.
responsibilities: Leading a team of 3 senior ML engineers
Developing and designing project's ML architecture
Implementing deep learning models for action detection, face detection and recognition
Establishing ML development workflows and best practices
Collaborating with other engineering teams to integrate ML solutions

items.title: Head of AI/ML
items.description: Led AI/ML initiatives for a gaming platform that prevents cheating in multiplayer games, with a total raise of $17.8 million.
responsibilities: Established company's ML/AI function, leading a team on innovative projects for the gaming industry
Developed anticheat systems for Counter Strike 2 and CS:GO using computer vision and deep learning
Created recommendation systems for content suggestions and gaming marketplace
Designed match-making and ranking systems for team play modes in Counter Strike
Scaled the team from 2 to 5 senior ML engineers, overseeing hiring and onboarding
Managed cross-team communication and stakeholder collaboration

items.title: Senior Lecturer
items.description: Designed and taught Electronics & Digital Design course for second-year undergraduate students.
responsibilities: Developed comprehensive curriculum for Electronics & Digital Design
Delivered lectures and practical sessions to undergraduate students
Designed assessments and evaluated student performance
Provided academic guidance and support to students

items.title: Teaching Assistant
items.description: Taught various courses to undergraduate students across different years.
responsibilities: Taught Calculus to first-year students
Delivered Introduction to Python course to second-year students
Taught Statistical Inference to third-year students
Provided support during practical sessions and office hours
Assisted with grading and providing feedback on assignments

items.title: Research Assistant
items.description: Designed machine learning algorithms for brain-computer interface systems, specifically the EEG-based P300 Speller.
responsibilities: Developed novel machine learning algorithms for EEG signal processing
Conducted research on P300 Speller technology
Published 5 academic papers in international conferences and journals
Collaborated with interdisciplinary research teams
Presented research findings at academic conferences

items.title: Founder
items.description: Founded and managed a job board dedicated to IT specialists in Kazakhstan, connecting talented professionals with employers in the tech industry.

items.title: Co-founder
items.description: Co-founded and grew a community of data scientists in Kazakhstan to over 7,000 members, organizing events, workshops, and knowledge-sharing initiatives.
